mapper.sql: c_id, c_name, c_password, c_phone, c_location, c_email, c_time, c_description, c_photo, c_type, c_flag
mapper.select: select * from company order by c_id asc
mapper.insert: insert into company (c_id, c_name, c_password, c_phone, c_location, c_email, c_time, c_description, c_photo, c_type,c_flag) select #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} from dual where not exists(select c_email from company where c_email=#{cEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and not exists(select c_name from company where c_name=#{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into company
c_id,
c_name,
c_password,
c_phone,
c_location,
c_email,
c_time,
c_description,
c_photo,
c_type,
c_flag,

mapper.update:
update company
c_name = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_password = #{cPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_phone = #{cPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_location = #{cLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_email = #{cEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_time = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
c_description = #{cDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_photo = #{cPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_type = #{cType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_flag = #{cFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update company set c_name = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_password = #{cPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_phone = #{cPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_location = #{cLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_email = #{cEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_time = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, c_description = #{cDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_photo = #{cPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_type = #{cType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_flag = #{cFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
